div.p: James L Dodds
Co# 8=23rd Engir
mex Exp Forces
Miss Ellen Smith
111 Hatton Street
Jackson
Tennessee
U.S.A.
Montigny France
Dear Ellen:
I received your letter of April 15 thirsday and of course you know I was glad to hear from you You remember I told you last Sunday I was away from my Company.
Well I am still out here did not go in to day as, had to work this morning I will help to move this outfit tomorrow and then will go back to My Co. at Langres
This bunch I am with now are going back home and they have only been over here about 7 months I have been over 14 and I have to stay at let
them go back. Well I wont say what I think about it They might put me in Jail.
They have had a band concert there this afernoon and had to play Home Ward bound. Now I know you can imagine about how I feel.
I guess when every body else get out from over here I will get to come home then. Thair isnt a soul over here that seems to know any thing about when we will get home
I think Linn Div will leave soon if they havent already. I have never heard a
word from him since he left Souelly. I wrote him almost two months ago. I guess he never received My letter thar
We are having some real Nice weather Now Has not rained in over two week I dont think But the roads are so dusty Cant hardlybuse whiieout an truck
But I believe will take dust rather than rain. I have got a long trip to make tomorrow Morning this bunch
But I will be glad to get rid of them so can be with my Company.
Well say I am surprised My self about Fanny liking Me better than she did Everett. I never knew anything about it Will I will find out some of these day just how slow I have been.
I thank will speed up when I get home so wont get left all the time. Think will study law making the rest of my time over here and maiybe when I get home can get some one to listen to me.
The bad part I havent any one to practis with over here. Cause I cant talk to
these French Girls.
Well thair is very little news flying around over here so will quit for this time Write me real often for I am always so glad to get your letters
With lots of love
James. L.
